metadata.human_readable: Corpus collection for 2-block, 4-block, 8-block towers. Language production priors on batches of the data.

pages:
Welcome to this experiment. This experiment should take a total of 15 minutes.

You will be compensated at a base rate of $15/hour for a total of $3.75, which you will receive as long as you complete the study.

We take your compensation and time seriously! The main experimenter's email for this experiment is cogtoolslab.requester@gmail.com.

Please write this down now, and email us with your Prolific ID and the subject line Compensation for language experiment if you have problems submitting this task, or if it takes much more time than expected.

In this experiment, you will see images of towers made from blocks.


Your task is to write a short description of each image.


You should imagine that you are writing to remind yourself of what the tower looked like, so that you could identify it later on based on your description alone.
You will see a total of 13 images during the experiment. Click next to begin the experiment.
